rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports factual information without high-potency language.
The verb describes status ('was'). The number ('more than 2.7 million') describes flock size, not impact.
The segment does not contain a question.
The segment reports a fact, lacking explicit calming language.
The segment contains a number ('more than 2.7 million') but no minimiser.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports details of an infected flock, not capabilities or preparedness.
Reports the number of birds (more than 2.7 million chickens) factually.
